duties_responsibilities.duty: Passionately represents products and services, delivers product demonstrations, and provides comprehensive customer onboarding.
Achieves sales and customer experience goals, partners with customer care, and consistently demonstrates sales excellence.
Performs operational and administrative tasks, complies with operational policies, and completes training requirements.
Works a flexible schedule and may be asked to work in alternate stores. Carries and lifts up to 25 pound boxes, stands and moves about the store constantly.
Understands operating principles, owns the customer experience, knows and understands sales compensation plan, and demonstrates integrity and a warm and friendly demeanor.
Contributes to the Net Promoter System, drives results and growth, respects and promotes inclusion & diversity, and does what's right for customers and communities.
Understands operating principles, owns the customer experience, knows and understands sales compensation plan, and actively engage in team huddles and learning.
